Body: Hi I have a simple python code on my Raspberry pi 2 that reads data from the dht22 sensor and posts it to web, but when i leave the program running after like a minute or so the sensor starts returning none". I have checked the wireing multiple times

Body: Sometimes the reading will be None, just purely because Linux can't guarantee the reading timing will be correct. Rerunning may address that (and you'll never be able to guarantee a particular execution will work). If that still fails, try the higher resistor between the input pin and 3.3V)
I ended up running this program in the backround and updating the thingspeak site. Then in the main program i was pulling information from thingspeak.
